name: HUE Team
description:
HUE Team is a Top-Down shooter where you guide a Team of characters to objectives using tactics and skill.

Each Team Member is a certain color, which deals extra damage to enemies with their health color. Watch out for Elites, which are strong against one of your colors. Make sure to watch each others' backs!

CONTROLS: WASD to Move, Q and E to Switch Characters, Click to Shoot, Right Click to Rally your Team

(Let us know if you find the Easter Egg :D)

Credit to SecretJuice1 for the main project. He did the vast majority of the coding and had the original idea of this game. He did an outstanding job on everything in time due.

Credit to FractureTheWatcher for the script writing, plot, scenes, and character design.

Credit to mathidiot for the sprite modeling, the main menu & credits, and other side art that was used.

Credit to Anne Robb for the character art used for the dialogues and the title screen art.
